me sewawa sandaha ayakarana gasthu da paudgalika rohalwala wisheshagnya waidyawarunge gasthuwalata wada adu gasthuwaki.sathiye wada karana kalawelawan thuladi samanya prathikara sandaha sayanawalata paminena rogingen rupiyal 150ka mudalak aya karanu labayi.paudgalitha chanal sewaya mangin rohale gewana wattuwalata athulath karana rogin wenuwen aya karana gasthu kramayan da paudgalika rohal sewawala rogingen aya karana gasthuwalata wada aduya.nomile waidya prathikara athulu subasadhana sewa rasak da mehi sewakayan wenuwen kriyathmakaya.

ee, ewani sthawarayak magin demala jathika sandhanaya ranil wikramasinha hata ‘sahaya pala karana’ bawata peni ya haki nisath, ee nayin eya ‘sinhala’ nathinam ‘dakune’ nayakayan dedeneku athara bala aragalayedi demala jathika sandhanaya parshawayak ganima ha sama wana nisath wuni.

ada rupiyal 50 k gewa me pradeshaye wasiyanta wathura baralayak milata ganimata siduwi athi athara meya kothek kalak kala haki wedayi gataluwak bawata pathwa thibe.wallawaya ayispilla jala yojana kramaye pirisidu jalaya aanapallamata nuduru warunagama dakwa sapaye.ema jalaya sathiyakata dina thuna hatharak ho aanapallama janathawata da laba dimata katayuthu karanne nam mahangu pinkamaki.ese nowannenam wallawaya nagarika jala yojana kramaya kirindi gangen ho buththala jala yojana kramayen aanapallama gamata jalaya laba ganimata piyawara gatha yuthuwa thibe.me pilibandawa rajaye, uuwa palath sabhawe menma wallawaya pradeshiya sabhawe kadinam awadhanaya yomuwiya yuthuwa atha.dambaegoda jinadasa,aanapallama, wallawayaaranayaka mathiwarana kottasaye aranayaka pradeshiya lekam bala pradeshaye duldeniya gramasewa wasamata ayithi kiringala gama 1947 warshayedi nawa janapadayak lesa aarambha wuwaki.me gamata widuliya laba dena bawata porondu pita porondu labunath widuliya nam labune natha.

mathiwaranayata pera apeksha shri lankawa prathama jayagrahanaya wartha karayi tharagaye wiraya mahela krida shri lankawa prathama jayagrahanaya wartha karayi tharagaye wiraya mahela maharufhmalinga pradarshanathmaka pandu yawimaka 9 wani loka kusalana krikati tharagawaliya yatathe muhunadun prathama tharagayen barmiyudawata erehiwa dawantha lakunu 243 ka jayak wartha kirimata shri lankawa samath puwath shrilanipayen aasana matitamin raswim nagenahira jayagrahanaya, jiwana wiyadamata wisandum, wipakshaye a shrilanipayen aasana matitamin raswim janitha senewirathna nagenahira jayagrahanaya, jiwana wiyadamata wisandum, wipakshaye awaladawalata pilithuru yana karunu yatathe mathiwarana asana matitamin janathawa danuwath kirime nawa wadapiliwelak shri lanka nidahas pakshaya aarambha karana bawa ema pakshaye bhandagari puwath kotinta ru.

ee bawa raju purohitha bamunagen wimasu kala sihinen peni sitiye paththini dewiya bawath, age sapayak rajuta athi nisa nirmala buddha shasanayak thibena, sathara maha dewala thibena ratakata gos dina 7 k dugi magi yachakadinta dan di ee pin paththini dewiyata paminawiya yuthu bawath kiya.

me athara 1977 di balayata path je. aar. jayawardhanayange eksath jathika paksha aramudalata wishala washayen dayaka wu ewaka prakata thuranga tharaga wyaparikayan dedenaku wu thahar ha mukthar da bandhanagaragatha kara sitiye rohana wijewira athulu karalikaruwan da siragatha kala "filiks dayas bandaranayakayan handunwa dun aparadha yukthi winishchaya komishan sabha panatha" namathi suwishesha nithiya yatatheya.
anathuren wan rathaye gamangath pudgalayin nawa deneku thuwala laba athi athara owun prathikara sandaha kaluthara saha bandaragama rohal wetha athulath kara thibe.

dan hari amaruyi puthawa kohewath dala yanna.
